```{r}
# Load dataset
szn_stats <- read.csv("./Seasons_Stats.csv")
player_data <- read.csv("./player_data.csv")
szn_stats$PPG <- szn_stats$PTS/szn_nums$G
szn_stats$ORPG <- szn_stats$ORB/szn_nums$G
szn_stats$DRPG <- szn_stats$DRB/szn_nums$G
szn_stats$APG <- szn_stats$AST/szn_nums$G
szn_stats$BPG <- szn_stats$BLK/szn_nums$G
szn_stats$TPG <- szn_stats$TOV/szn_nums$G
szn_nums <- szn_stats
szn_nums$Tm <- NULL
szn_nums$Player <- NULL
szn_nums$Pos <- NULL

```


```{r}
# Extract era averages here

era1 <- szn_nums[which(szn_nums$Year <= 1965),]
era1 <- era1[!is.na(era1$PER), ]
era1avg <- colMeans(era1)

era2 <- szn_nums[which(szn_nums$Year > 1965 & szn_nums$Year <= 1980),]
era2avg <- colMeans(era2)

era3 <- szn_nums[which(szn_nums$Year > 1980 & szn_nums$Year <= 1990),]
era3avg <- colMeans(era3)

era4 <- szn_nums[which(szn_nums$Year > 1990 & szn_nums$Year <= 2000),]
era4avg <- colMeans(era4)

era5 <- szn_nums[which(szn_nums$Year > 2000 & szn_nums$Year <= 2010),]
era5avg <- colMeans(era5)

era6 <- szn_nums[which(szn_nums$Year > 2010),]
era6avg <- colMeans(era6)
era6
```
